Statement: [Image happy]Hello again! I know we met earlier but in case you forgot I'm Robin.
If you ever need anyone to talk to, come find me!
[Image angry]I can't find my best hammer.
[Image neutral]I have several so it isn't really that big of an issue I guess.
[Image sad]The weight is just right though.
[Image happy]Remeber I told you I had lost my hammer?
Well, I found it in Maru's room!
She's always tinkering with something!
[Image happy]I built our house from the ground up.
It's the biggest project I have taken on so far.
[Image angry]I'm really proud of this house.
Have I told you that I built this house?
Oh, yeah, I guess I have.
[Image happy]I'm just really proud of it.
Hey [Farmer]!
If you need any building materials or blueprints, my shop is the place to go!
Plus, you're helping support our local economy.
Do you go to the saloon?
I go there with Demetrius and dance on Friday nights.
You should come and say hi!
Hey there, [Farmer].
I was just daydreaming about some new carpentry projects.
[Image happy]I love working with wood!
You're always welcome to visit us, even if you aren't shopping, you know.
It can get pretty lonely up in the mountains.
You're always welcome to visit me, even if you aren't shopping, you know.
I get pretty lonely up in the mountains.
I'm always really happen when you visit.
You really help me feel less alone up in the mountains.
I've heard you've been getting to know Leah.
What do you think of her?
How do you respond:
Really...?
Wow, good for you!
I would love to have someone to talk about wood working with.
I know her art is different than what I do...
but at least she would have some understanding of what I'm talking about.
[Image happy]I've heard that!
[Image sad]I wish I had her freedom some times.
[Image neutral]Well, let her know that I'd love to talk wood with her some time.
I've been thinking a lot about Leah since we last talked.
I think she might be exactly the kind of person I need in my life right now.
Thanks for talking to me about her.
My son, Sebastian, lives downstairs.
Not sure if you've met him, he's a little shy.
I'm sure he'll warm up to you if you're nice to him.
I've seen you talking to Sebastian.
I hope he's doing okay, he doesn't really talk to me very much.
I found an ashtray in Sebastian's room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?
Oh, nevermind, I shouldn't talk to you about it.
It's just that sometimes I worry about Sebastian... he doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about his future very much...
I would talk to him about it but he never opens up to me.
I found another ashtray in Sebastian's room that smelled weird.
Do you think I should worry about it?
He is a grown up after all... he just doesn't seem to worry about himself.
How do you respond:
Oh, you're probably right.
It's hard not to worry about your kids.
He doesn't worry enough about himself, you know. He thinks that somehow everything is going to suddenly work itself out.
But it won't. Nothing 'works it's self out,' someone works it out, someone figures out what to do.
You're right though, if I say anything I'm just going to be the 'over-protective mom' and he'll just get mad at me for it.
I failed him some how, I wish...
I wish he'd open up to me.
I know, but it's just so hard not to worry.
He doesn't worry enough about himself, you know. He thinks that somehow everything is going to suddenly work itself out.
But it won't. Nothing 'works it's self out,' someone works it out, someone figures out what to do.
You're right though, if I say anything I'm just going to be the 'over-protective mom' and he'll just get mad at me for it.
I failed him some how, I wish...
I wish he'd open up to me.
Oh... No. I don't want to put you in that position.
He'd most likely think I put you up to it anyway, so he'd most likely be mad at you for taking my side.
There aren't sides though are there, I'm just trying to help him, that's not a different side.
It's his side, whether he likes it or not!
And I have to worry about him, because he doesn't worry about himself.
He thinks that somehow everything is going to suddenly work itself out.
But it won't. Nothing 'works it's self out,' someone works it out, someone figures out what to do.
You're right though, if I say anything I'm just going to be the 'over-protective mom' and he'll just get mad at me for it.
I failed him some how, I wish...
I wish he'd open up to me.
It won't go well if I do.
He'll say I'm just an over-protective mom, worrying about nothing.
Nothing but him! He's my son.
He doesn't worry about himself, at all. So, I have to worry about him.
He thinks that somehow everything is going to suddenly work itself out.
But it won't. Nothing 'works it's self out,' someone works it out, someone figures out what to do.
He's going to say, I'm just going to be the 'over-protective mom' and then he'll be mad at me for it.
I failed him some how, I wish...
I wish he'd open up to me.
But I didn't become a mom to have children like me, I became a mom to raise them into responsible adults
I will talk to him, it won't go well, but I have to try.
Well that went about as well as expected...
Oh, sorry, the conversation about the weird smell with Sabastian.
He told me it was nothing, I told him he needed to be careful, he told me I was treating him like a child.
I told him he needed to stop acting like a child...
That was probably a mistake. Though he does!
He needs to find his own place to live, I'd love it was in town, but regardless he needs to take responsibility for himself.
Thanks for listening, I'm really glad we're friends.
[Image happy]Our house is in such a beautiful area, don't you think?
I love the fresh air of the mountains.
I hope Demetrius doesn't blow the house up with those science experiments of his.
I'm not even sure what he's working on. I think it has something to do with plants.
[Image angry]My husband almost set the house on fire last night with his science experiment.
One of his beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.
[Image sad]Sorry about the weird smell in here, [Farmer]. It's my husband's bizarre science project...
[Image sad]The house still smells from that explosion Demetrius caused.
He and Maru did scrub his lab down to try to help, but I had to do the rest of the house.
Sabastian apparently doesn't mind the smell...
I hope Demetrius doesn't blow the house up, again, with those science experiments of his.
I'm not even sure what he's working on. He can't explain it to me in a way that makes sense.
[Image angry]Something to do with plants, but plants aren't know for throwing fireballs at my ceiling!
Hi [Farmer]! It's good to see you.
Do you feel like you're apart of the community yet?
How do you respond?
I'm happy to hear that!
You've been here for so long, it's hard to imagine the valley without you.
I'm sorry to hear that!
If there is anything I can do to make you feel more at home just let me know!
I've been thinking about you not feeling at home here yet.
Well..
I wanted you to know that you being here has made my life better. And I don't think I'm alone in that feeling.
So thanks for moving to the valley.
Thanks for being my friend.
It means a lot.
Oh! Well, I guess the city does have lots of things to do that we don't out here.
Wood is a wonderful substance... it's versatile, cheap, strong, and each piece has it's own unique character!
The beautiful soft wood you get in the summer, is one of the reasons I love the season.
It cracks more easily, so you have to be a bit more careful.
If you need any buildings on your farm upgraded, just ask me!
You'll need to provide enough lumber and stone for the project. And it costs money, too.
[Image happy]But I'm sure you'll be pleased with the results!
I really like building projects in the summer!
We're pretty insulated from the rest of the world here in Stardew Valley.
It has its pros and cons.
I love being away from the city, but it'd be nice to have more places to go out.
You know, some times it'd be nice to go out without anyone knowing who I am.
So...
How are you and Maru getting along?
How are you and Maru getting along?
That's great! She's always working on her inventions.
Maybe you could help her with her inventions!
[Image happy]Farmer by day! Inventor by night!
Well, if you're interested in inventing, she's a good lady to know!
I keep hoping she'll create something that she can sell and move out on her own.
[Image sad]I don't know what Demetrius would do if she left home though.
[Image love]That's great, little hint, she loves her inventions.
She uses a lot of gems in her in them, so if you want to impress her thats a safe way to go.
Have you met the wild man that lives behind our house?
Oh really!
He's a little disconcerting, but I guess he isn't doing any harm up there.
I do wonder why he lives up there some times.
You don't think he's dangerous?
As long as he doesn't bother us, and he hasn't so far, I guess I don't really mind.
I do wonder why he lives up there some times, and what he does with all of his time.
He hasn't caused any trouble so far.
I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us.
He hasn't caused any trouble so far.
I guess I don't really mind, as long as he doesn't bother us.
Hey [Farmer]!
With the farm work settled down it's a great time to gather wood!
The wood is harder in the winter so you don't have to be careful with it.
Maybe nows a good time to collect enough to upgrade your house!
My parents were bewildered when I told them I wanted to be a carpenter.
[Image sad]They were pretty old-fashioned and wanted me to spend my time looking for a carpenter, rather than being one.
[Image sad]I was thinking about my parents not supporting my decision to go into woodworking.
I know it's not the same but...
I wonder if thats how Sabastian feel about going into computers.
[Image neutral]It's not like I told him it was a bad idea, but I don't know how to talk to him about them.
[Image sad]I guess he must feel pretty unsupported to.
Our house is in such a beautiful area, isn't it?
Everything looks still and clean after a fresh snow.
